item.title: Marvell To Strengthen European Cloud Security With Microsoft Partnership
item.description: The move will let Marvell expand its cloud-based security footprint in Europe, building on its existing services in Asia and North America.

item.title: Why Did SMX Stock Fall 30% Today?
item.description: SMX signed a $111.5 million equity purchase agreement with Target Capital 1, which will allow it to use part of the net proceeds to acquire bitcoin or...

item.title: Jensen Huang Says China Is A ‘Bonus’ Growth Opportunity For Nvidia – Shrugs Off Google TPU Competition
item.description: In an interview with CNBC, the Nvidia CEO said the company’s current demand pipeline is strong enough without relying on China.

item.title: Goldman Sachs Strengthens ETF Portfolio With Acquisition Of Innovator Capital Management For $2 Billion
item.description: The acquisition of Innovator Capital Management will add $28 billion in assets under supervision to Goldman Sachs’ Asset Management portfolio.

item.title: What Are Defined Outcome ETFs?
item.description: Defined outcome ETFs logged net inflows of $5.7 billion in the first four months of the year, compared with just over $10 billion in 2024.
